name: Magiczna Kostka
overview: Magiczna Kostka is a computer adaptation of famous Rubik's Cube. The cube is presented in a standard 2D mode, including all the classic colours: white, red, blue, orange, green, and yellow. Solving the puzzle requires each face to be returned to have only one colour. The game features only one option, allowing to switch the time on or off and is keyboard (direction) and mouse (row) controlled.
